name: single organism
description: The organism represented by a subject in the 'single organism' granularity category

name: host of host-pathogen system
description: The organism identified as the host for a subject assigned to the 'host-pathogen system' granularity category

name: pathogen
description: An organism identified as a pathogen in a subject assigned to the 'host-pathogen system' granularity category

name: host of symbiont system
description: The organism (optionally) identified as the host for a subject assigned to the 'symbiont system' granularity category

name: symbiont
description: An organism identified as a symbiont within a subject assigned to the 'symbiont system' granularity category

name: host of host-associated microbiome
description: The organism identified as the host for a subject assigned to the 'host-associated microbiome' granularity category

name: microbiome taxon
description: A constituent taxon of either (a) a subject assigned to the 'environmental microbiome' granularity category or (b) the microbiome (non-host) portion of a subject assigned to the 'host-associated microbiome' granularity category

name: cell line ancestor
description: A taxon identified as a source organism for a subject assigned to either of the 'cell line' granularity categories (single-organism or hybrid)
